# Germany

Top 20 advertisers by spending.

*Data from: December 11, 2025 • Spending in USD*

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
dashboardr::enable_inputs()
```

```{r setup}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false
#| error: false
#| results: 'hide'

# Load required libraries
library(dashboardr)
library(dplyr)
library(highcharter)

# Global chunk options
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  error = FALSE,
  fig.width = 12,
  fig.height = 8,
  dpi = 300
)

# Load data
data <- readRDS('dataset_small_20obs.rds')

# Data summary
cat('Dataset loaded:', nrow(data), 'rows,', ncol(data), 'columns\n')

# Create filtered datasets
# Each filter is applied once and reused across visualizations

data_filtered_723724bf <- data %>% dplyr::filter(party == "B90/Gr")
data_filtered_d9c03193 <- data %>% dplyr::filter(party == "FDP")
data_filtered_4f94a62f <- data %>% dplyr::filter(party == "Volt")
data_filtered_d6a0003a <- data %>% dplyr::filter(party == "CDU")
data_filtered_40523fe1 <- data %>% dplyr::filter(party == "PdH")

```


```{r}
#| echo: false
#| results: 'asis'
dashboardr::render_input_row(list(
  list(
    input_id = "advertiser_filter",
    label = "Filter Advertiser:",
    type = "select_multiple",
    filter_var = "advertiser",
    options = NULL,
    options_from = "advertiser",
    default_selected = NULL,
    placeholder = "Select...",
    width = "300px",
    min = 0,
    max = 100,
    step = 1,
    value = NULL,
    show_value = TRUE,
    inline = TRUE,
    toggle_series = NULL,
    override = FALSE,
    labels = NULL,
    size = "md",
    help = NULL,
    disabled = FALSE,
    mt = NULL,
    mr = NULL,
    mb = NULL,
    ml = NULL
  )
), style = "boxed", align = "center")
```

```{r by-party-total}
# All Advertisers

  data = data,
  title = "All Advertisers",
  horizontal = TRUE,
  x_var = "advertiser",
  weight_var = "total_spend"
)

result
```
